content: self-striping yarn and a simple variation on the tunisian simple stitch come together easily to create a sophisticated-looking unisex cowl you can keep the ease of this stunning stitch to yourself when the compliments start rolling in despite the appearance of complicated colorwork you ll be left with only a couple tails to weave in at the end of this quick rectangular cowl this pattern is perfect for advanced beginner tunisian crocheters who are interested in adding the technique of post stitches to their toolkits alternative color suggestion given for a more neutral/masculine look this ad-free printable pattern includes a written pattern step-by-step photo tutorials and links to video tutorials this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew this a written pattern step-by-step photo tutorials and links to video tutorials new to tunisian crochet we ve got you covered with beginner video tutorials here 1 you can see all our modern tunisian crochet patterns here 2 1 https //makeanddocrew com/how-to-tunisian-crochet/ 2 https //makeanddocrew com/tag/tunisian-crochet
